All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBookingDialog
    implements objects specific to this JDialog
    Booking
    implementation of the bookings containing important informations like date, time, name
    BookingController
    implements a controller that calls the methods from the model and view packages
    ClassRoom
    extension of the Room class to specialize Classrooms
    DateLabelFormatter  
    DeleteBookingDialog
    implements objects specific to this JDialog
    EditBookingDialog
    implements objects specific to this JDialog
    LabRoom
    extension of the Room class to specialize the laboratories
    MainClass  
    MenuFrame
    Creates the frame that contains the buttons and the table that show the bookings
    MyFileChooser
    implements different JFileChoosers to be used based on the pressed button
    MyTable
    Sets the List with the updated one from the model and updates the table to show the bookings based on the chose date
    Room<E extends Booking>
    implements the rooms which implement a List of bookings and all the methods to work on said bookings.
    RoomManager
    the manager of the model package, creates the List whith the rooms and the bookings and every method called from the model is called in here or through here
    TableCellRenderer
    Custom cell renderer for the table, highlighting cell colors based on room availability.
    ViewBookingsPanel
    creates the panel which will show the booking tables
